sentences.en: Alcohol causes a loss of judgment and alertness.
sentences.cn: 酒精会使人丧失判断力和警觉性。

sentences.en: Decades of studies of bird flocks led researchers to predict extra alertness in the more vulnerable, end of the row sleepers.
sentences.cn: 通过对鸟群几十年的研究，研究人员预测，那些更容易受伤的、睡眠时处于队列末端的鸟会格外警觉。

sentences.en: Another flaw of the tiredness theory is that yawning does not raise alertness or physiological activity, as the theory would predict.
sentences.cn: 疲劳理论的另一个缺陷是，打哈欠并不能像该理论所预测的那样，提高警觉性或生理活跃度。
